title: Restructuring Your Reality, Lobster University Press and Absorbing Jordan B. Peterson
description:
Annette Poizner, with MSW from Columbia and Doctorate in Counseling Psychology from University of Toronto, Founder of Lobster University Press

Links:

For more information about the writing, clinical work, animations, 
media, presentations of Annette Poizner, MSW, Ed.D., RSW: 
ap.annettepoizner.com

Books by Annette Poizner:

A Practical Summary & Workbook for Using Jordan Peterson's 'Maps of 
Meaning' to Sort Yourself Out
https://amzn.to/2tPwYw6

This Way Up: A Faith-Based Introduction to Jordan Peterson's 'Maps of 
Meaning'
https://amzn.to/38eGckk

An Illustrated Guide for Using Jordan Peterson's Insights on Divinity & 
the Map of Meaning to Sort Yourself Out
https://amzn.to/2UICGL8

Clean Your Room: an Out-Of-The-Box Manual for Lobsters
https://amzn.to/2H9n0bS

Clinical Graphology: An Interpretive Manual for Mental Health 
Practitioners
https://amzn.to/3br1IV9


More about Milton H Erickson 
https://www.erickson-foundation.org/biography/

More about what we learn from lobsters shared by Dr. Abraham Twerski 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dcUAIpZrwog

Dennis Prager on Mass Shootings 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oH2jtuT68mE

Five Element Theory from Chinese Medicine 
https://www.tcmworld.org/what-is-tcm/five-elements/

About Graphology: http://annettepoizner.com/psychvol24-1.pdf

Introducing the work of Rabbi Akiva Tatz: In this talk, he talks about 
the meaning of the concept of 5 (Think 5 Books of Moses, 5 Element 
Theory from Chinese Medicine, 5 Factor Personality Theory, etc.)
https://www.simpletoremember.com/media/a/chumash-and-the-pattern-of-five/

Convo Notes:

We find metaphors everywhere that reveal our internal maps of meaning.
Lobsters have different phases of growth. Their vulnerability without the shell, the phase transition when the shell is too tight just before they break out into something new.

The Map of Meaning is buried in the unconscious, so we need to work with the unconscious to manifest these shifts.
Dr. Poizner uses Projective Personality Assessment to clarify the dynamic of the unconscious mind.

Restructuring the self is like the alchemical process cited by Jung, as we are choreographed into the birth of the higher self.

Projective Personality Assessment takes into account talents, world view, undercurrents of the personality, which show up in handwriting, art, stories, dreams, earliest memories.
When the diagnosis is correct, the cure begins.

Non-dominant clinical approaches:
5 element theory of Chinese Medicine

Wood, water, fire, earth, metal
Mothering Cycle:  Yes. water mothers wood, mothers fire, mothers earth, mothers metal mothers water and the cycle starts again.
Fathering Cycle: No. Father sets a limit. Water sets a limit on fire, etc.
Each governs part of our physiology and psychology. Example:  water governs the kidney meridian relates to the sage and to wisdom.
Where is your center of gravity? What are you avoiding?

The Psychology of Magnificence

Milton H. Erickson Institute of Toronto

The importance of line. Straight line. 

Why Jordan Peterson and why now?

Lobster University Press founded to present works explaining his ideas for a wider audience and to assist individuals in their own path to wellness.
